animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts! Who am I?

hints.text: 💧 I use my nose to drink water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I'm a good friend to humans. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I like to swim even when it rains.

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 My favorite food is orange and crunchy.

animal.question: I roar loudly and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane around my head.

animal.question: I can fly and I build nests in trees. What am I?
I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes help me blend in with the herd.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I squirt ink when I'm scared.
🌊 I can change color to camouflage.
🪨 I like to hide in rocks.

animal.question: I am a reptile, change color, and have a very long tongue. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I use my tongue to catch bugs

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes pretty colors. I need water and sun to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I can be given as a gift.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk, and birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 I might lose my leaves in the fall.
🌳 I give you shade on a sunny day.

plant.question: I am long, orange and often found in salads. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me.

plant.question: I have seeds inside, I can be red, green, or yellow, and grow on vines. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I am used to make sauce
🔴 I can be used for Ketchup

plant.question: I am a type of plant with a thick stem that you grind up to make flour. What am I?
I have prickly leaves and can live in the desert for a very long time without water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I am often found in the desert.
🏜️ I can store a lot of water inside.
🦝 I have pointy needles that protect me.

plant.question: I am a plant with a very strong smell that some people use to keep vampires away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍽️ I am used to flavor food.
🧛 Some people think I scare away vampires.

plant.question: I am a very tall, thin plant that grows quickly. Pandas love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐼 I am a food source for Pandas.
🥢 I can be used for building.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows underground and has 'eyes'. People love to eat me mashed, fried, or baked. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 French fries are made from me.
👁️ I have eyes but can't see.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows on a cob. You can pop me to make a tasty treat at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🎬 You eat me at the movies.
